Test.Name: Correct response with one token (MaxLimit>1)
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO test when DUT returns GetDoorInfoListResponse with one token

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DOORCONTROL-2-1-8 GET DOOR INFO
STEP 1 - Get Door Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceDoor11/DoorService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that the DUT returned service capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get DoorInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that result is not null STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get DoorInfo (token=tokenDoorPoint1) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Compare DoorInfo got via GetDoorInfo and via GetDoorInfoList STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED
